title: Layers
description: Check out A.K.A.  2018 indieBRAG gold medallion winner!LAYERSBOOK ONE OF THE LOL SMEXY LAYERS SERIESALL FOUR BOOKS OF THE LAYERS SERIES ARE PUBLISHED. NO WAITING FOR THAT HEA! PLUS IT'S A FREE READ!!Dear reading thank you! If possible, please leave a review on Amazon!! Alexia Keith, self-proclaimed nerd, and potty-mouth, is a beautiful, scotch drinking, complicated mess. In other words, she has issues, and the last thing she needs is her boss, Jaxson Ryan, CEO of Ryan Acquisitions, messing with her issues. She finds him hard and even harder to resist, but she must, he’s off limits. One of New York’s most eligible bachelors, Jaxson Ryan, is the poster boy for the tall, hot, conceited self-proclaimed manwhores. The only thing he wants is Ryan’s, Risk Manager, Alexia Keith. What happens, when a man with a bedpost-notching waiting list, a man who thought he had it all, wants the only woman he can’t have?Layer SeriesLayersMore LayersBeneath LayersBeyond Layers Samantha and Logan's story.Life is a Bitchwad Layers Novelette @www. tlalexanderauthor.com/giveaways/Layers Boxset books one-three* * *
author: T.L. Alexander
